channel.title: LSE:AAL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:AAL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Valterra Profit Hit by Platinum Mine Flooding, Spinoff Costs
item.description: Valterra Platinum Ltd. said first-half profit likely fell as much as 98% after flooding curbed mine output and it incurred costs related to its recent spinoff from Anglo American Plc.

item.title: Valterra Profit Hit by Platinum Mine Flooding, Spinoff Costs
item.description: Valterra Platinum Ltd. said first-half profit likely fell as much as 98% after flooding curbed mine output and it incurred costs related to its recent spinoff from Anglo American Plc.
